actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4106 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 40. Record Vote Number: 141.
Amendment SA 4106 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S4947-4948, S4950-4951, S4954) To enhance the enforcement of labor protections for United States workers and guest workers.

purpose: To enhance the enforcement of labor protections for United States workers and guest workers.
